name: Little Dark Riding Hood
description:
Controls :
Movement - Arrows keys
Menu - Mouse click

Here is Little Dark Riding Hood, a one-minute game and my first ever game jam project, please be gentle! :)

The jam was certainly educational in making me realize how short 48h actually are (especially since I didn't have the whole weekend free). The final result is maybe 5% of what I thought I would be able to do in that time-frame.

Anyways, I hope you enjoy it! I tried pulling it in a sillier direction to fit the lack of content better.


Thanks to :

Paul Melancon for the great music (http://www.melanconmusic.com/music)
Chris Burrows for the text display system (http://www.diybandits.com.au/MMF/)
Lanea Zimmerman for the Interior art
Hyptosis for the Exterior art
Slimmmeiske2 for inspiration for the Hood sprite
